rukus.text: 111|1|dai teangpir( tongveu) robsa a pou la hab ban vineasa a nd reay  haey ke ka vineasa a nd reay .
111|2|tropy sa mb tde robsa ke ning avei  delke ban sang kanlongomk  minban phdal phalobrayoch dl ke laey .
111|3|ke nung chaul tow knong nork del mean andataphleung da santho  santhow .
111|4|haey phriyea robsa ke del chea anak yk banlea( reay leu phlauv  daembi thveubeab mou ham meat) ka dauchnaoh der .
111|5|now nung k robsa neang mean khsae chr vea k phleung .
